thread.title: BRIEF-Aveva Group Says ‍Delivered Constant Currency Revenue Growth In First Nine Months

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Aveva Group Says ‍Delivered Constant Currency Revenue Growth In First Nine Months

organizations.name: brief-aveva group says ‍delivered constant currency revenue

text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Aveva Group Plc:
* TRADING UPDATE AND CONTRACT EXTENSION * ‍DELIVERED CONSTANT CURRENCY REVENUE GROWTH IN FIRST NINE MONTHS ACROSS ALL REPORTING REGIONS​
* “‍AHEAD OF BOARD‘S PREVIOUS REVENUE EXPECTATIONS FOR THIS STAGE OF FINANCIAL YEAR”​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
